services.title: GDPR Services: CMP Setup & Cookie Banner Fixes

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

items.question: How is a CMP different from a simple banner?
items.answer: A CMP records lawful consent per category and controls script loading via consent events; a simple banner won‚Äôt ensure proper pre-consent blocking.

items.question: Do you support Google Consent Mode v2?
items.answer: Yes, we configure Consent Mode and GTM triggers accordingly.

items.question: How long does implementation take?
items.answer: Typically 3‚Äì7 days depending on scope and stack.

checklist.title: GDPR Compliance Checklist
checklist.subtitle: Interactive checklist to assess your current GDPR compliance status

items.title: Privacy Policy Updated
items.description: Clear, comprehensive privacy policy covering all data processing activities

items.title: Legal Basis Identified
items.description: Legal basis for processing identified for all data collection

items.title: Valid Consent Mechanism
items.description: Proper consent collection with clear opt-in/opt-out options

items.title: Data Processing Mapping
items.description: Complete mapping of all personal data processing activities

items.title: DPO Appointed (if required)
items.description: Data Protection Officer appointed if processing meets GDPR thresholds

items.title: Compliant Cookie Banner
items.description: Cookie banner with proper categorization and consent options

items.title: Script Blocking Before Consent
items.description: All tracking scripts blocked until user provides consent

items.title: Consent Proof Logging
items.description: System to log and prove user consent with timestamps

items.title: Data Encryption
items.description: Personal data encrypted both in transit and at rest

items.title: Secure Data Backups
items.description: Regular, encrypted backups with access controls

items.title: Access Controls Implemented
items.description: Role-based access controls for personal data systems

items.title: Staff GDPR Training
items.description: Regular GDPR awareness training for all staff handling personal data

items.title: Data Breach Procedures
items.description: Clear procedures for detecting, reporting, and handling data breaches

items.title: Vendor Data Processing Agreements
items.description: DPAs in place with all third-party data processors

items.title: Data Retention Policy
items.description: Clear policy on how long different types of data are retained

items.title: Data Subject Rights Process
items.description: Procedures for handling data subject access, deletion, and portability requests

items.title: Regular Compliance Audits
items.description: Scheduled internal audits of GDPR compliance measures

recommendations.excellent: Excellent! Your GDPR compliance is comprehensive. Continue regular audits to maintain standards.

cookieConsent.title: We use cookies to enhance your experience
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to help personalize content, provide social media features, and analyze our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising, and analytics partners.
cookieConsent.essentialDesc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled.
cookieConsent.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
cookieConsent.marketingDesc: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements.
cookieConsent.functionalDesc: Enable enhanced functionality and personalization such as chat support and social media integration.
